## hasCertificateFor() function

Check whether a certificate with a given common\_name has been installed

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function hasCertificateFor(commonName: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  commonName | <code>string</code> | commonName of certificate whose existence is being checked |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
